mapper.select: select from TBUILD_ENV_VARIABLE ORDER by ENV_VAR_ORDER_NUM DESC
select from TBUILD_ENV_VARIABLE ORDER by ENV_VAR_ORDER_NUM ASC
select case when max(ENV_VAR_ORDER_NUM) is null then 1 else max(ENV_VAR_ORDER_NUM)+1 end ORDERNUM from TBUILD_ENV_VARIABLE

select * from TBUILD_ENV_VARIABLE where ENV_VAR_ORDER_NUM = (select max(ENV_VAR_ORDER_NUM) from TBUILD_ENV_VARIABLE where ENV_VAR_ORDER_NUM<(select ENV_VAR_ORDER_NUM from TBUILD_ENV_VARIABLE where ENV_VAR_ID=#{Id,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}))

select * from TBUILD_ENV_VARIABLE where ENV_VAR_ORDER_NUM = (select min(ENV_VAR_ORDER_NUM) from TBUILD_ENV_VARIABLE where ENV_VAR_ORDER_NUM>(select ENV_VAR_ORDER_NUM from TBUILD_ENV_VARIABLE where ENV_VAR_ID=#{Id,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}))
